name: Naughty Bricks
description:
Naughty Bricks is a cheeky puzzle game set to test you with a series of increasingly complex conundrums. Bounce off moon chunks, slingshot around black holes and even rewind time itself to destroy those naughty invaders!

Naughty Bricks are attacking our solar system! Who will defend the earth? Who will avenge the moon?

FEATURES
Over 70 hand crafted puzzles spread across 4 delightful episodes.
Trajectory-bending Black Holes and portals to play with.
Direct manipulation of TIME ITSELF. Who needs causality?
Universal support.
No in-app purchases.
